overview: As President and CEO of HighJump Software and member of the company’s board, Timothy Campbell leads the HighJump management team in setting and executing upon the strategic direction for the organization. As HighJump aggressively expands its product portfolio and worldwide business both organically and through acquisition, Mr. Campbell brings to the organization over 20 years of expertise in the software industry and a wealth of experience in software business management and executive leadership. Mr. Campbell joined HighJump from Symyx Software, the software division of Symyx Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: SMMX), where he held the position of president and grew the company rapidly to over $100 million. This growth included the successful acquisition and integration of MDL Information Systems which, when combined with Symyx Software, resulted in the market-leading cheminformatics technology provider serving life sciences, chemicals and energy. Mr. Campbellâ€™s tenure also includes chief executive positions at Steelwedge Software, a provider of supply chain planning software, Industri-Matematik International, a provider of supply chain execution solutions, and ePIT Systems Inc., an enterprise software provider of trading infrastructure for regulated exchanges and investment banks.
